name: WP Scripts Customizer
author: ThemeHall

sections.description: WP Scripts Customizer provides you with two fields that will output to the head section of your site before the closing head tag and just before the closing body tag. These will appear on every page of the site and are a great way to add analytic code, Google Font and other scripts. Only user with unfiltered_html capability that able to access these fields. unfiltered_html allows you to post HTML markup or even JavaScript code. Developed by themehall
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload /wp-scripts-customizer/ directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to “Appearance > Customizer” and find “Scripts” section to manage the options

short_description: WP Scripts Customizer allows to enter scripts you would like output to head and footer of your WordPress theme page via WordPress Theme customizer.
description: WP Scripts Customizer provides you with two fields that will output to the head section of your site before the closing head tag and just before the closing body tag. These will appear on every page of the site and are a great way to add analytic code, Google Font and other scripts. Only user with unfiltered_html capability that able to access these fields. unfiltered_html allows you to post HTML markup or even JavaScript code. Developed by themehall
